message_file.msg: Database write failed, please let us know.
Congratulations, registration succesful, now wait for someone to activate your account.
Your e-mail address is your login in this V2 instance.
Your username cannot be longer than 500 chars.
Your description cannot be longer than 1500 characters.
Description is an optional place for additional info about yourself, it can me 500 characters long.
Congratulations! Your account has been sucesfully registered, an e-mail with activation link has been sent to supplied e-mail address. In a case of any trouble or questions please contact us.
Activation succesful, you can now log in!
